text: Michael Rennie (born Eric Alexander Rennie; 25 August 1909 - 10 June 1971) was an English actor. He is best known for his starring role as the space visitor Klaatu in the science fiction movie The Day the Earth Stood Still (1951). ==Other websites== * * * The Complete Michael Rennie â€“ Fan site Category:1909 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Deaths from aortic aneurysm Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Yorkshire
